entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Light snow beginning late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then clearing. Amount 2 cm over southern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 22.
